body.name: Happy Elephant Fabric Softener - Ultra Concentrated, Fabric Conditioner, Liquid Laundry Softener, Eco Friendly, Gentle, Fresh Linen, 64 Loads - White Tea and Fig (64 fl oz - Pack of 1)

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Compact by Design (Certified by Amazon) products remove excess air and water, which reduces the carbon footprint of shipping and packaging.

features: Ultimate Softness: Happy Elephant Liquid Laundry Fabric Softener is your secret to achieving ultimate softness in every load. Our advanced formula pampers your clothes, leaving them luxuriously soft to the touch.

Exceptional Cleaning: Beyond softness, our fabric softener also enhances the cleaning power of our detergent. It helps break down stubborn stains, ensuring that your laundry comes out both clean and incredibly soft.

Easy to Use: Our fabric softener is designed for your convenience. Simply add it to your washing machine's dispenser or during the rinse cycle, and let it work its magic. No hassle, just beautifully soft clothes.

Eco Friendly Approach: We are committed to the environment. Our fabric softener utilizes Soforo, a powerful natural cleaning agent that's readily biodegradable. You can enjoy the benefits of softness while being kind to the planet.

Gentle on Skin: Suitable for even the most sensitive skin, our fabric softener is crafted from 100% readily biodegradable ingredients. It's free from harsh ingredients, ensuring that your family's clothes are gentle on the skin. Unlike the leading competitors that use petroleum based detergents and softeners.
body.description: Happy Elephant liquid fabric softener is a premium addition to your laundry routine. This fabric softener ensures your clothes are not only soft but also free of any residual scent, thanks to its natural essential oils. Whether used alone or in combination with Happy Elephant laundry detergent, this fabric softener leaves your laundry with a natural and fresh feel. It is even safe for baby clothes. Our secret is Soforo. Soforo is a significant ingredient in Happy Elephant's liquid laundry detergent, and it plays a crucial role in ensuring effective cleaning. It is a natural cleaning agent made from 100% botanical based ingredients, contributing to the product's eco friendly and safe composition. Soforo ingredient facilitates thorough cleaning without leaving any residue on your clothing, which means your garments come out of the wash both clean and residue free. This ingredient aligns with Happy Elephant's commitment to sustainability and responsible cleaning practices, as it is derived from natural sources and safely returns to the earth, minimizing environmental impact. Soforo enhances the cleaning power of Happy Elephant's laundry detergent, making it a top choice for those seeking a detergent that is both effective and environmentally friendly. Happy Elephant is dedicated to conservation efforts, partnering with the Borneo Conservation Trust (BCT) to contribute towards preserving the lush rainforests of Borneo. Through this partnership, Happy Elephant donates 1% of its sales to support the vital work of BCT. BCT is a non-governmental organization (NGO) in Sabah, Malaysia, focused on the conservation and protection of Borneo's unique and endangered ecosystems. This support aids in the management and protection of valuable natural habitats and wildlife in the region. The collaboration between Happy Elephant and BCT exemplifies the brand's commitment to environmental sustainability and its contribution to safeguarding the environment and its diverse ecosystems.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This smells so good! It does its job in cleaning as well. I will purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Smells good, leaves clothes soft…. This stuff is amazing! Doesn’t itch my sensitive skin either :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Natural soap for laundry
reviews.reviewText: I really like the scent of this laundry soap and just wish the scent lasted after the wash and dry. This is a plant based laundry detergent that is powerful at cleaning laundry. I did use a bit extra when doing my laundry for stains and was impressed with that part , but I did think it was a bit watery for what I am used to.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the smell

reviews.reviewerName: I don’t review, but when I do…
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Couldn’t really tell a difference
reviews.reviewText: Leakage- no, bottle does not leak. Smell- no scent. Softeners- I couldn’t even tell I used it. Value for money- hard to say because I was hoping for something that left my clothes smelling pretty and feeling softer than they were. Perhaps this may be good for someone with allergies?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars As good as the national brands, with a delicate clean scent
reviews.reviewText: It used the same way as other liquid softener, and I prefer the smell. My laundry came out just as good as usual. If the price is right for you, I recommend it.This is a review of Happy Elephant Fabric Softener - Ultra Concentrated, Laundry Conditioner, Liquid Fabric Softener, Eco Friendly - 64 Loads - White Tea and Fig (64 fl oz - Pack of 1)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Happy Elephant Fabric Softener
reviews.reviewText: This Happy Elephant fabric softener has a nice scent! It makes my clothes smell amazing! It also makes them feel really soft. I can even use it on my most fragile delicates. I also really like that it's eco-friendly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Overall a solid fabric softener
reviews.reviewText: So this smells really good in the jug. I notice way more of the white tea scent compared to the fig (which is great, since I was worried the fig would be overpowering but it is a very light and refreshing scent). The recommended amount per load seems to be enough after using it a couple times on different fabric types...unlike many of the eco-friendly alternatives I have tried where I have to double or triple the amount to get the same results as the bigger name brand stuff.While it does smell great in the jug, I find that the scent is pretty mild by the time things come out of the dryer (not a huge deal to me, but it could be a pro or con depending on what you are looking for).
